name: AS_8_4_Manage_Healthcare_Facility_Performance_Information
title: AS.8.4 Manage Healthcare Facility Performance Information (Function)
description: Support the import or retrieval of data necessary to review available quality, performance, and cost measurements regarding healthcare facilities.
purpose: The ability to access information to help facilities with the gathering, managing and using data to assist in the assessment of quality, performance and cost measurements.

statement.label: AS.8.4#01
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD provide the ability to manage healthcare facility data required to assess health care quality, performance and cost.
